name: OMG! Quinoa Patties
author: MaryLou Hunter
summary: I use all organic ingredients. These quinoa patties are OMG good!
ingredients: 1 cup dry quinoa, rinsed and drained
3 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed, divided
garlic powder, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup oat groats, ground into a powder
directions: Bring vegetable broth, water, and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and broth has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Spread quinoa onto a large platter to cool
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir onion, zucchini, and carrot in hot oil until the onion is translucent, 3 to 5 minutes; transfer to a plate to cool
Mix cooled vegetables with 3 cups of the cooled quinoa in a large bowl; season with garlic powder, salt, and black pepper
Pour eggs and ground oats into the bowl; stir until the mixture comes together
Divide mixture into 14 portions and shape into patties
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Fry patties in hot oil until browned, about 2 minutes per side
Use more oil between batches as needed
